replies.body: I don't like how the left side of the screen looks so empty now, i also dislike the items being on the right it just feels/looks weird, will have to get used to it i guess.

Wish could change back to the old one. Why change it? Nothing was wrong.
Also the new pirate commentator needs to tone it down a bit. The softer female voice was far better, after you've played 20 games in a row.

P.S. Thank god its not in ranked games! But yeah get rid of that pirate and bring the softer voice back please, or give us the option.
I'm not the biggest fan of it either.
